To activate your account, follow the link we've sent to your inbox."
"<font color=Red>Looks like</font> the number %s has been recycled by your carrier, and there's a Mi Account associated with it. Is this account yours?"
%1$s has been bound with your account. You can use it to sign in or to reset your password.

The email you entered is already associated with another account.
The email address you entered is invalid
"You haven't set the password yet. Sign in with SMS."
The username you entered is invalid.
Make sure your SIM card service is activated and the device is connected to the network.

Creating your Mi Account means that you agree that Xiaomi will collect, process, and use your personal data, including verification data (e.g., verification codes), Second space data (e.g., information about the ways you use Second space, IDs used in First and Second spaces), and other data specified in our Privacy Policy. Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn how we process and use personal data.
Visit account.mi.com to reset your password.
<font color=Red>Looks like</font> the number %s has been recycled by your carrier. Check when the number went online?
Check when the number went online
"We are requesting permission to get your device's IMEI. Mi Account uses IMEI to identify the device on which you sign in / sign up, to help keep your Mi Account safe."
This number is associated with an existing account, enter your password
"Can't connect to the network. You can view this page at %s."
One Mi Account. All Mi services.
Sign in to your Mi Account
Password must be 8-16 characters in length and include both numbers and letters (case sensitive).

resources.string: "They aren't mine. I'll use a different one."

Add your phone number to protect your account.
You can set up a Mi Account later in Settings.
Your account info is being synced now, you can sign in using your Mi Account ID. If you want to sign in using your phone or email, wait until the info is fully synced.

Make sure you remember your password. You can use it to sign in to other Mi services.
